oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Illustrations from Harper's Weekly of James Harlan and Fort Morgan
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This back page contains an engraved illustration, "Photographed by Brady," of James Harlan, Secretary of the Interior, as well as illustrations of Fort Morgan, Ala. on Mobile Bay, Alabama, and General Schofield's headquarters in Wilmington, N. C.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Harlan, James, 1820-1899
